code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine] --> Idle: Pet Created
    
    Idle --> Washing: Start Wash Button
    
    state Washing {HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault] --> TimerRunning
        TimerRunning --> CalculateRemaining: Every 0.5s
        CalculateRemaining --> TimerRunning: remaining > 0
        CalculateRemaining --> TimerComplete: remaining ≤ 0
        
        state TimerRunning {HealthTech_LabAnalyzer] --> SaveState
            SaveState --> UpdateUI
            UpdateUI --> SaveState: Loop
            
            note right of SaveState
                UserDefaults:
                - endTime: Date
                - type: .wash
                - petID: UUID
            end note
        }
        
        state TimerComplete {HealthTech_LabAnalyzer] --> CancelTimer
            CancelTimer --> ClearState
            ClearState --> SendNotification
            SendNotification --> [HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
        }
    }
    
    Washing --> WashComplete: Timer Expires
    
    WashComplete --> Drying: Start Dry Button
    
    state Drying {HealthTech_EMR_Sync] --> TimerRunning2
        TimerRunning2 --> CalculateRemaining2: Every 0.5s
        CalculateRemaining2 --> TimerRunning2: remaining > 0
        CalculateRemaining2 --> TimerComplete2: remaining ≤ 0
        
        state TimerRunning2 {HealthTech_EMR_Sync] --> SaveState2
            SaveState2 --> UpdateUI2
            UpdateUI2 --> SaveState2: Loop
            
            note right of SaveState2
                UserDefaults:
                - endTime: Date
                - type: .dry
                - petID: UUID
            end note
        }
        
        state TimerComplete2 {HealthTech_LabAnalyzer] --> CancelTimer2
            CancelTimer2 --> ClearState2
            ClearState2 --> SendNotification2
            SendNotification2 --> [HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
        }
    }
    
    Drying --> DryComplete: Timer Expires
    
    DryComplete --> Folding: Ready to Fold State
    
    Folding --> CycleComplete: User Taps Fold
    
    state CycleComplete {HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault] --> UpdatePetHealth
        UpdatePetHealth --> UpdateStats
        UpdateStats --> ClearNotifications
        ClearNotifications --> SaveDatabase
        SaveDatabase --> [HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
        
        note right of UpdatePetHealth
            Pet Updates:
            - health = 100
            - state = .happy
            - lastLaundryDate = now
            - cyclesCompleted += 1
            - streak updated
        end note
    }
    
    CycleComplete --> Idle: Return to Idle
    
    Washing --> RecoveryCheck: App Reopened
    Drying --> RecoveryCheck: App Reopened
    
    state RecoveryCheck {HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault] --> LoadUserDefaults
        LoadUserDefaults --> ValidateState
        ValidateState --> CalculateActualRemaining
        CalculateActualRemaining --> [HealthTech_PatientRecords]
        
        note right of ValidateState
            Validation:
            - endTime exists?
            - endTime reasonable?
            - Not too far in future?
            - Not too far in past?
        end note
    }
    
    RecoveryCheck --> Washing: Timer Still Running
    RecoveryCheck --> WashComplete: Timer Expired
    RecoveryCheck --> Drying: Timer Still Running
    RecoveryCheck --> DryComplete: Timer Expired
    RecoveryCheck --> Idle: Corrupted/Invalid
    
    Idle --> HealthDecay: Time Passes
    WashComplete --> HealthDecay: Time Passes
    DryComplete --> HealthDecay: Time Passes
    
    state HealthDecay {HealthTech_EMR_Sync] --> CheckLastLaundry
        CheckLastLaundry --> CalculateHealth
        CalculateHealth --> UpdateState
        
        note right of CalculateHealth
            Health Decay:
            daysSince = now - lastLaundryDate
            expected = cycleFrequencyDays
            health = 100 * (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
            
            State Transitions:
            100-75% → Happy
            75-50% → Neutral
            50-25% → Sad
            25-1% → Very Sad
            0% → Dead
        end note
        
        UpdateState --> [HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
    }
    
    HealthDecay --> Idle: Health Updated
    HealthDecay --> Dead: Health = 0
    
    Dead --> [HealthTech_EMR_Sync]: Pet Dies
    
    note left of Idle
        Idle State:
        - No active timers
        - Can start wash
        - Health decaying over time
    end note
    
    note right of WashComplete
        Wash Complete:
        - Notification sent
        - Can start dry
        - Pet waiting
    end note
    
    note right of DryComplete
        Dry Complete:
        - Notification sent
        - Ready to fold
        - Tap to complete
    end note
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 接下来是关于 HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine 和 HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault 的逻辑。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine 和 HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault'，你看看合适吗？
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 HealthTech_LabAnalyzer 和 HealthTech_LabAnalyzer 的分支。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'HealthTech_LabAnalyzer 和 HealthTech_LabAnalyzer'，你看看合适吗？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 HealthTech_EMR_Sync 和 HealthTech_EMR_Sync 这一块。

没问题。

没问题。
